channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Senate Democrat demands Trump fire 'creep' Stephen Miller in exchange for his DHS funding vote
item.description: Sen. Ruben Gallego, D-Ariz., is joined by Sen. Thom Tillis, R-N.C., in his disdain for White House deputy chief of staff for policy Stephen Miller.

item.title: ‘I meant what I said in Davos’: Carney says he really is planning a Canada split with the U.S. along with 12 new trade deals
item.description: He also visibly rolled his eyes at Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent’s contention that he had walked back his comments at the World Economic Forum.

item.title: Celebrating the Historically Low Murder Rate

item.title: Trump Has Failed His Nullification Crisis. Other States Will Follow Minnesota’s Example

item.title: Backlash erupts after Ohio Democratic AG candidate posts about ‘killing’ Trump: 'Absolute psychopath'
